metadata.name: Pin Galaxy Broadcast #1
metadata.description:
*Tuning into frequency*

I hope someone receives this message.

I was able to infiltrate the facility.

I'm hiding, they are looking for me.

I don't think I will be able to get out of here.

That's why I had to start this broadcast.

I obtained undisclosed documents that reveal some truths about the planetary alliance.

From what I've found, the rumours about a military research were true.

The planetary alliance has been using Stardust to develop military technology.

They have several agreements with different corporations.

Their motive is still to be discovered.

But this goes against all they have been telling to the public.

The Pin Galaxy is in peace.

We don't have enemies.

What are they planning?

Do they know something we don't?

...

Oh shit, they have found me!

Share this message with the galaxy.

We must reveal the truth!
